content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Russian

# Target Fragment
dim corridor

# Target Sentence
We walked down a dim corridor toward the archive room

# Context
The building was old. <sentence>We walked down a <fragment>dim corridor</fragment> toward the archive room</sentence> Dust floated in the beam of a single lamp.
{"translation":"тусклый коридор","sentence_translation":"Мы прошли по тусклому коридору к архивной комнате"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Russian

# Target Fragment
steady snowfall

# Target Sentence
A steady snowfall covered the square overnight

# Context
By morning the cars were white. <sentence>A <fragment>steady snowfall</fragment> covered the square overnight</sentence> Children rushed outside with sleds.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Russian

# Target Fragment
sharp turn

# Target Sentence
The road made a sharp turn after the bridge

# Context
Fog hung over the river. <sentence>The road made a <fragment>sharp turn</fragment> after the bridge</sentence> Warning signs reflected in the headlights.
{"translation":"резкий поворот","sentence_translation":"После моста дорога делала резкий поворот"}
